title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Ethereum (ETH) Gains 2.6%, Leading Index Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Ripple (XRP) joined Ethereum (ETH) as a top performer, rising 2%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3258.85, up 1.8% (+58.26) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

Twelve of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: ETH (+2.6%) and XRP (+2.0%).

Laggards: BCH (-1.2%) and HBAR (-1.2%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is up 1.8% with 12 of 20 assets trading higher, led by ETH (+2.6%) and XRP (+2.0%), indicating overall positive market performance.
